class.name: Terrain3DEditor
class.description: This class handles all of the sculpting and painting operations for Terrain3D.

method.name: apply_undo
method.description: Undo the previous changes, with the provided data. Used by Godot, not gamedevs.

method.name: backup_region
method.description: Adds a region to the currently pending operation undo snapshot. [method is_operating] must be true.

method.name: get_operation
method.description: Returns the current selected tool operation (eg. add, subtract).

method.name: get_terrain
method.description: Returns the instance of Terrain3D this class is conneced to.

method.name: get_tool
method.description: Returns the current tool selected in the editor plugin.

method.name: is_operating
method.description: Returns true if currently in the middle of a brushing operation.

method.name: set_brush_data
method.description: Sets all brush settings used in the editor plugin.

method.name: set_operation
method.description: Sets the tool operation used in the editor plugin.

method.name: set_terrain
method.description: Sets the instance of Terrain3D this class is connected to.

method.name: set_tool
method.description: Sets the tool selected in the editor plugin.

method.name: start_operation
method.description: Begin a sculpting or painting operation.

method.name: stop_operation
method.description: End a sculpting or painting operation.
